quote_last: is all that you need to discover the error, and re-set the clock – provide that you bother to go up and make the observation.
title: Odalisque: The Baroque Cycle #3
author: Neal Stephenson

quote_first: But I can tell you this: Z-spotting at Rotfield Mall confirmed yesterday at
quote_last: Location: In-Between Burger. Subject: Teenage male, light brown hair, blue eyes.
title: Zombie Field Day
author: Nadia Higgins
